page.title: 06OUR HOBBIES
page.content: {CORRINGHAM CORPS OF DRUMS}IS A MARCHING BAND.I USED TO PLAY THE TRUMPET NOW I PLAY THE HORN.WE PLAYED FOR THE ELDERY AND WE PLAYED AT CONTESTS.ONCE WE PLAYED AT THE ALBERT HALL.WE DID AN EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE AND CAME FIRST. IT WAS REALLY FUN. I PLAY THE{FLUTE}AND ON A TUESDAY EVENING I GO TO MUSIC SCHOOL AT GABLE HALL SCHOOL.MY MUSIC TEACHER IS MR MAGEE HE IS VERY NICE.HE HELPS ME ALOT AND TELLS ME WHEN I GO WRONG.I STARTED TO PLAY THE FLUTE AT THE AGE OF NINE AND A HALF.I AM ON MY GRADE FOUR AND FIVE. I LIKE{DANCING}AND IT'S VERY ENJOYABLE.I DO FOUR THINGS:TAP,BALLET, MODERN AND JAZZ.I HAVE BEEN GOING FOR A COUPLE OF YEARS.OF COURSE WE HAVE TO PAY FOR THE LESSONS AND MY MUM KEEPS ON COMPLAINING ABOUT ALL THE MONEY SHE HAS TO PAY.
